title: Jayminat
author: Jayminat
content: Friends , bear market is running We can make our portfolio big till the bull marketAnd for doing that , we need a good plan and good mentorSo , yes , me , with small experience of crypto market have made a channel for you https://telegram.me/ConquerCryptoMarket  --- You can check the previous posts for our glimpse!!I will post here the coins that I will be buying for the bull , btc updates , our moves for the great bull and some good and free knowledge for you !!Remember : This is not a Pump & Dump group .We provide genuine calls fundamentallyThe signals and buying calls that we provide are not Financial Advice but #DYOR #NFAEverything is free here !! We don't have a premium group and will never have one . Everything is shared with everyone

comments.author: GreenStox
comments.body: i see the channell but its only 3 sub there, are you trying to get member from your post.but people will doubt you, because you saying you have less/small experience in crypto, you not say that when you promote your channel.people will say what people want to hear.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Jayminat on March 20, 2023, 05:41:49 AMFriends , bear market is runningWe can make our portfolio big till the bull marketAnd for doing that , we need a good plan and good mentorThis forum is enough to provide a good plan for people to invest in bitcoin or any other cryptocurrencies. As for trading, this forum can be enough too, but some people like to refer people to where they have much control because they want to later introduce a paid service which some newbies that join at that time will see to be good until they try paid signals and see it failing for them as they lose.Quote from: Jayminat on March 20, 2023, 05:41:49 AMEverything is free here !! We don't have a premium group and will never have one . Everything is shared with everyoneThat is good, but I do not always recommend telegram group except newbies have known how it can lead to scam by impersonation and also knowing the introducing paying services, which are only scam. There are many of the telegram groups that start as free but later become a paid one that are collecting money from newbies and later the newbies see it as scam as they lose. It is actually a scam though.As for me, this forum is enough for investing and trading discussion, but some people may find other places good too if they can avoid scam, but I highly will not recommend telegram groups.Quote from: GreenStox on March 20, 2023, 08:06:44 AMbut people will doubt you, because you saying you have less/small experience in crypto, you not say that when you promote your channel.Small experience with dealing with what is related to money, I think that should be avoided.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Jayminat on March 20, 2023, 05:41:49 AM...I will post here the coins that I will be buying for the bull , btc updates , our moves for the great bull and some good and free knowledge for you !!...Who are you to follow your signals? In order for someone to listen to your signals and join the group, you need to tell about your professional knowledge and confirm with statistics of your successful trading, if any. Otherwise, anyone who joins your group has a high chance of losing their money.

comments.author: CryptoBuds
comments.body: Quote from: Jayminat on March 20, 2023, 05:41:49 AMAnd for doing that , we need a good plan and good mentorIt has only 3 members and it's free because you need to attract members and when the number of members get bigger I think you will charge. You are right, we need a plan, but we don't need a mentor or a signal channel, thanks for providing it, but I don't think everyone on the forum will need it. All of us here are used to doing everything ourselves and don't need any help by providing a signal because we believe that no good meal comes for free. It's good if you can build the team by sharing knowledge and experience rather than signals.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I wouldn't go on your channel but it's a good idea if you're going to post here updates and picks that you've got. Since most of us like to stay in the forum and don't want to visit channels that we're not yet familiar with. It's best to give those predictions and signals that you've got on that stay in this thread. And from there, you'll get to show what you're up to, and everyone we'll see if you've got good accuracy and you're proving us wrong with what we're saying about trading signals. Because in reality, most of them are truly the same and do have one goal and aim from their community and members. If you know what I mean, you'll understand why everyone is thinking that it's just a useless thing to be part of any trading group if no informative posts are there and just mere predictions and shills.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: As long as your channel is free and we can share trading information, you can build a channel that will attract more people.I haven't looked at your channel so I don't know how many people have joined. And if you can provide a more detailed explanation about the analysis, I found many channels that only provide buying and selling targets and don't explain much about it. So as long as people can benefit from your channel, they will be on it.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: You are kind enough to share your knowledge and trading signals with newbies. but even for a newbie, it's hard to believe when the channel you manage only a few joins. there is no testimony or even proof that you are professional in making signals.although I'm sure you are not a beginner, what you display is like a beginner who wants to build your channel. to be honest, if you search the forum will be difficult for you. maybe on social media, you can find newbies who will become members of your followers.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: Jayminat on March 20, 2023, 05:41:49 AMFriends , bear market is running We can make our portfolio big till the bull marketAnd for doing that , we need a good plan and good mentorSo , yes , me , with small experience of crypto market have made a channel for you https://telegram.me/ConquerCryptoMarket  --- You can check the previous posts for our glimpse!!I will post here the coins that I will be buying for the bull , btc updates , our moves for the great bull and some good and free knowledge for you !!Remember : This is not a Pump & Dump group .We provide genuine calls fundamentallyThe signals and buying calls that we provide are not Financial Advice but #DYOR #NFAEverything is free here !! We don't have a premium group and will never have one . Everything is shared with everyoneYou have to share your trading journal with us. Otherwise, how do we know you are getting good profits or losses?  Eg: - Total trades per day- Percentage of wins and reason for the win- Percentage of losses and the reasons for losses- What analytics you used

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: I haven't gone over to your channel yet, but if you have the good intentions of building your channel bigger that can't hurt. From some of the comments I've seen, the channel doesn't have many members so it's safe to say that the channel was just founded by you. I'm not trying to be negative about you, but from my experience some channels are established free for everyone. But as they get bigger, they'll try to charge, and I've seen a lot of them. I hope you don't if one day your channel gets big. Hopefully you can also provide education there, not just share trading signals.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: I like the way you hyped yourself, I don't mind if you have 2 people on your channel, all I care about is the results. I want you to show the performance of your past calls, this is very important and what experience do you have that will make people to trust you with their money.

comments.author: teosanru
comments.body: Quote from: Jayminat on March 20, 2023, 05:41:49 AMFriends , bear market is running We can make our portfolio big till the bull marketAnd for doing that , we need a good plan and good mentorSo , yes , me , with small experience of crypto market have made a channel for you https://telegram.me/ConquerCryptoMarket  --- You can check the previous posts for our glimpse!!I will post here the coins that I will be buying for the bull , btc updates , our moves for the great bull and some good and free knowledge for you !!Remember : This is not a Pump & Dump group .We provide genuine calls fundamentallyThe signals and buying calls that we provide are not Financial Advice but #DYOR #NFAEverything is free here !! We don't have a premium group and will never have one . Everything is shared with everyoneI saw your channel, i see that the channel has very less post frequency. I would suggest to increase the frequency of your calls if you it's actually about trading, i mean updating atleast daily status of Bitcoin would be something bare minimum. Even if it's a fundamental analysis long term investing group it's always a good idea to share current scenarios of old trades on daily or alternative day basis because these days market is slightly dynamic.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: It's funny how you refer to it as an amazing signal channel and yet it has just eight subscribers. I know the size doesn't really tell if it's amazing or not but the person giving out the signals will be the criteria to determine if a channel is amazing or not. For now I'll advice that you try to grow your channel by inviting more traders and those interested in getting signals (even though it's not advisable) but try not to invite or buy bots into your channel because having bits as members isn't really cool if you ask me. It's better to have 300 real subscribers than to have 3,000 subscribers with 90% bots.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: You still have a few people running with your channel and that is going to discourage people if they want to join because traders that like to follow do prefer larger group size. If you want people to believe in what sincerity you have about your channel, you have to post the outcome of your calls here. You have to increase your effort to grow.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: Jayminat on March 20, 2023, 05:41:49 AMSo , yes , me , with small experience of crypto market have made a channel for you How with a small experience you can suggest someone to risking their money? Do you have any previous data of your trading history? If so you can provide them also here. Otherwise, I can not understand how people will believe you and why they will follow you. QuoteRemember : This is not a Pump & Dump group .Nice, but most of these telegram trading signal group starts like '' nor a pump dump group'' later they get some people in their telegram group they start scheduling pump signal and grabbing a lot of money from the followers.

comments.author: jaberwock
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on March 23, 2023, 05:48:03 PMIt's funny how you refer to it as an amazing signal channel and yet it has just eight subscribers. I know the size doesn't really tell if it's amazing or not but the person giving out the signals will be the criteria to determine if a channel is amazing or not. For now I'll advice that you try to grow your channel by inviting more traders and those interested in getting signals (even though it's not advisable) but try not to invite or buy bots into your channel because having bits as members isn't really cool if you ask me. It's better to have 300 real subscribers than to have 3,000 subscribers with 90% bots. I think he is doing it now with the help of this thread but what do you mean by not advisable there?Are you referring to those who rely on signals? Like it or not there will be people who will rely on others because they are too lazy to research on their own and there might be some who only do it because they are newbies but will try to learn on their own eventually because it will always be better if we have our own knowledge. Yes, bots are not cool, More if they are spamming the group with repeated messages. I find this super annoying.

comments.author: Oilacris
comments.body: Quote from: jaberwock on March 24, 2023, 06:33:03 PMQuote from: Cantsay on March 23, 2023, 05:48:03 PMIt's funny how you refer to it as an amazing signal channel and yet it has just eight subscribers. I know the size doesn't really tell if it's amazing or not but the person giving out the signals will be the criteria to determine if a channel is amazing or not. For now I'll advice that you try to grow your channel by inviting more traders and those interested in getting signals (even though it's not advisable) but try not to invite or buy bots into your channel because having bits as members isn't really cool if you ask me. It's better to have 300 real subscribers than to have 3,000 subscribers with 90% bots. I think he is doing it now with the help of this thread but what do you mean by not advisable there?Are you referring to those who rely on signals? Like it or not there will be people who will rely on others because they are too lazy to research on their own and there might be some who only do it because they are newbies but will try to learn on their own eventually because it will always be better if we have our own knowledge. Yes, bots are not cool, More if they are spamming the group with repeated messages. I find this super annoying.We cant blame out some people on this forum about having doubts out of these groups which we do know that there are really groups who do really ask out for some sub fees on which its not really something that worth or recommendable and this is why people are really that allergic whenever there's someone who do really convince out to use up their TG groups.Based up on what OP had been said that its free and you could really have your own DYOR which is good because there are informations and learnings which you could getfrom someones advises and analysis but of course it do always falls out according into your own analysis too.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I don't see what a new channel of recommendations would add, hundreds of them have already been on telegram for ages.Even if it is free, this is not important because there are a lot of these channels that are free but useless, in addition to that, when they get a large number of subscribers, they start turning to paid recommendations.Personally, I tried many of them, and I did not find any channel that gives accurate enough signals. Most of them depend on luck or take recommendations from other channels and spread them to get money.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Well, it was the spammy channels being shared by the spammy accounts on telegram so for people who want to read this clickbait thread then please tend to do some research first. Yeah it's free but all you have in these kind of channels are unworthy signals, they'll show you the signals when it's already over to pump or dump. Most of these signals are about leverage.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: There is not that much in there on your channel and I've always been too doubtful if there's a truly good channel where people are just sharing information.Because if there is a legitimate group that does that, eventually, they'll make that group into a paid one and those that wants to pursue will be there but most likely, we see the scheme there that it's like a free trial version until they make everyone enticed that they'll feel that they're disposing information by not availing plan or upgrades on them just to be in to that group.
